Question: JumboAudio Electronics Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
JumboAudio Electronics Co., Ltd.

Professional Audio

- Offers line array speakers, party speakers, and PA speakers with tweeter
- Amplifiers and mixers are also available
- Specializes in OEM and ODM products
- Utilizes high-quality materials for durability and exceptional sound
- Owns R&D and amplifier workshop
- 3 manufacturing bases covering 40,000 square meters
- Annual production capacity of 1,200,000 pcs
- Strong R&D team with 12 professional technicians
- 14 automatic speaker assembly lines with 10 key quality control points
- Highly efficient quality control team
- Advanced management system including ISO9000/BSCI and ERP system
- Distributes products in US, Latin America, South Africa, and Europe
- Offers 1000W 2X10" sound box BT PA speaker system, 120W Titanium Compression Horn Driver, 6 channel Powered Mixer, and more
- Provides 4000W 2*15" Subwoofer, 3000W 2*12" Active Subwoofer, and 2000 Watts 15 inch Professional audio versatile powered speaker
- Integrated high-power amplification sound system with multi-color woofer lights
- Dual microphone input and echo effect for karaoke enjoyment
Summary_cn:
巨号音响电子有限公司。

专业音响

- 提供线阵音箱、派对音箱和带高音喇叭的PA音箱
- 同时提供功放和混音器设备
- 专注于原始设备制造和原始设计制造产品
- 采用高品质材料，耐用且音效出色
- 拥有研发和功放车间
- 3个制造基地，总面积达40,000平方米
- 年产能达1,200,000件
- 拥有12名专业技师的强大研发团队
- 14条自动音箱装配线，设有10个关键的质量控制点
- 高效的质量控制团队
- 先进的管理系统，包括ISO9000/BSCI和ERP系统
- 在美国、拉丁美洲、南非和欧洲销售产品
- 提供1000W 2X10英寸蓝牙PA音箱系统、120W钛压缩喇叭、6通道有源混音器等产品
- 提供4000W 2*15英寸低音炮、3000W 2*12英寸有源低音炮，以及2000瓦15英寸专业音频万能有源音箱
- 集成高功率放大音响系统，带有多彩低音炮灯光
- 双麦克风输入和回声效果，提供卡拉OK乐趣
